The main plot of this movie revolves around two people: Charles and Emma. They were once deeply in love, but then Charles left Emma behind without any explanation or apology. This caused a great deal of pain and hurt feelings for Emma, who never fully understood why Charles left her behind as he went to pursue another life with someone else.
Years later, after many years of pain, heartache, and hurt feelings, Emma finally finds the strength and courage within herself that she had been lacking in order to be able to heal her heart and overcome her sense of helplessness and despair.
